name: Lemon Ideas Innovations Pvt Ltd
description:
Lemon Ideas (www.lemonideas.in ) is on a mission “Innovation by EveryONE” and is working towards empowering talented individuals to convert their Ideas into Reality (Business Ventures). Lemon Ideas has become a known name in startup and entrepreneurship ecosystem over the years with its unique pedagogy and experimentation approach for real life entrepreneurs. Lemon is on a mission to nurture 1000 entrepreneurs and be part of 100 ventures creations by 2020 with a greater focus on building ecosystem in tier 2 and 3 cities.
Lemon offers various mentoring programs for ideas-startups and seasoned entrepreneurs with innovation and technology as key drivers. It also works with colleges and universities to build robust ‘Innovation & Entrepreneurship’ ecosystem (includes pre-Incubation consulting & experiential workshops). Lemon has pioneered 'Innopreneurs' (www.innopreneurs.in )which is a National level platform for innovators & aspiring entrepreneurs to showcase their 'project ideas' and get recognized in the Ecosystem. There is Incubation, mentoring & angel funding opportunities to the participants / winners.

portfolios.brief: Flying Penguins is end-to-end digital solutions company with a vision to empower 500+ Indian companies to  leverage digital platform to grow their business by 2020. Existence of last two years introduced three digital products & empowered 90+ companies globally. Flying Penguins is proud to support Indian Prime Minister’s (Narendra Modi) vision of “Digital India”.

As an award winning company, Web Beta provides services towards developing innovative ideas that have the  capability to allow companies flourish. Web Beta Pvt Ltd work with the objective of taking every business organization to new heights and achieve exceptional quality customer satisfaction. They specialize in health care domain and are master in SEO services for creating digital identity for their customers.

Khichadiwala is India’s first fast food joint an attempt by young entrepreneurs to re-brand the culture of fast food  with a mission to serve branded Indian Khichadi in various flavors at reasonable prices with no harmful preservatives unlike other options available in the market. Their innovative recipes have been health certified by the dietitian.

This venture is into delivering best of Oranges & orange based products under the brand name, "Orange n  Orange". Orange n Orange is an initiative from Nagpur which deals in oranges, orange bouquet/gifts & orange based products. These are all of premium quality, being handpicked by experts who grow them taking care at every stage, resulting in the customer getting the best of best. The venture has various categorized services as per client's suitability.

Buzzinga Labs (BL) have developed a unique technology in which users can showcase their complete infrastructure  online in 360 degrees view! BL uses this technology to create a 360 degree virtual tour of infrastructures which the end customer can experience from any corner of the world as if one is present there. This virtual reality experience can be hosted directly on any website. BL is also building a platform for users to create their own virtual tours in a very simple way.

name: a-IDEA NAARM TBI
description:
About a-IDEA
a-IDEA, is a Technology Business Incubator (TBI) hosted by ICAR-National Academy of Agricultural Research Management, Hyderabad & supported by Department of Science & Technology, Govt. of India (DST, GOI). a-IDEA has been housed in the Centre for Agri-Innovation at ICAR-NAARM for fostering innovation and entrepreneurship in agriculture in India. a-IDEA aims to help entrepreneurs ideate, incubate and accelerate their innovative early stage startups that are scalable to become competitive food and agri-business ventures through capacity building, mentoring , networking and advisory support. For more details, please visit our website: www.aidea.naarm.org.in 
Focus areas
 a-IDEA being one of the very few Agri-focused incubators in the country has a unique approach of supporting the broad spectrum of technologies in the value chain of agriculture starting from farm to fork. Through this approach a-IDEA intends to nurture, support and scale technologies that can bring efficacy in the value chains, improve productivity and benefit the stakeholders involved in such Agri-value chains. The technologies developed by technology developers, scientists, students, entrepreneurs, startups, institutions qualify under the focus areas of technologies supported by a-IDEA. 
 

Highlights of a-IDEA, The Technology Business Incubator.•	Is an agriculture focused incubator.
•	Is a recognized incubator under startup India initiative.
•	Launched India’s 1st Food & Agribusiness Accelerator with CIIE, IIM-A in 2015.
•	A holistic Agriculture incubator supporting Agri startups from idea to investment.
•	An Agriculture incubator providing seed investment to the Agri startups.
•	An incubator which provides customized incubation support to early stage Agri startups.
•	Till date 24 startups (8 under accelerator program & 15 under incubation program) supported, 1 graduate under incubation program.

Vision
Make precision agriculture accessible & affordable to world’s agriculture community through various ICT based technological innovations

name: Research Innovation Incubation Design Laboratory
description:
Research Innovation Incubation Design Laboratory Foundation (riidl) was set up in the year 2010, on its Mumbai campus, by Somaiya Vidyavihar [http://somaiya.edu] and supported by Somaiya Trust. It was created to drive innovation & entrepreneurship and currently facilitates 39,000+ students and 1800+ faculty in the campus as well as outside.

riidl (http://riidl.org/) has set up:

Technology Business Incubation supported by:
- Department of Science & Technology, Government of India
- BioNEST BIRAC, Government of India.
- Maharashtra State Innovation Society (2018), Maharashtra Government

Labs:
- Fablab Node https://www.fablabs.io/labs/riidl, Center for Bits and Atoms, Fab Foundation MIT USA
- India's First Do It Yourself Biolab called Bioriidl [http://bioriidl.org] with support of instructors from Bio Academy and Fab Foundation.
- XR riidl, where x means virtual / hyper / augmented reality

Community:
- Asia’s Biggest Maker Gathering - Maker Mela [http://www.makermela.com/] which annually hosts about
300+ global innovators. It is the premier event for grassroot innovations. Makers get an opportunity to
pitch their ideas to eminent angel investors, VC’s, government officials and industry.
- India’s Biggest Evolutionary Movement in Biology - Darwin [http://www.thedarwin.in] which annually
hosts about 101 Darwinians and 200+ biohackers globally. It is an international conference for
bio-enthusiasts and designed to promote the Biohacking movement in India.
- We also organize a lot of other startup programs to take different projects from idea to market stage.
- Facebook Developer Circles Mumbai, GDG Mumbai with over 15000+ members in total.

The incubator operates through an autonomous not-for-profit entity model. riidl comprises of Somaiya Vidyavihar faculty, alumni and partners with like-minded organizations to promote innovations in SMAC, Robotics, AR/VR, Electronic embedded systems, Healthcare, Biotech, Agri tech and Food tech.

Online portal for selling event tickets
Aggregator for office spaces - Funded by lead angels

name: IIMK LIVE
description:
Indian Institute of Management Kozhikode (IIMK) is the fifth IIM set up by Government of India and is committed to research and education in management domain to meet national human resources development goals. Over last two decades, the institute has made significant intellectual, economic and social impact at national and local level.

IIMK LIVE is the business incubator and entrepreneurship development center hosted by IIM Kozhikode and is set up with the support of Department of Science and Technology, Government of India. Established in June 2016, the center is envisioned to function as a business incubator with a purpose of creating a National Centre of Excellence that promotes innovation, new business venturing and entrepreneurship. Towards this, it seeks to emerge as a collaborative platform that helps transform innovative ideas into business ventures that make significant economic and social impact.

Incubation of startup enterprises, thus, is primary activity of IIMK LIVE. Apart from Incubation Program for Start-ups, it seeks to carry out activities that promote entrepreneurship on IIMK campus and across greater community, conduct training and research in the domain of entrepreneurship, foster innovation through competitive events, extend pre-incubation support to shape ideas, conduct accelerator/ cohort-based programs to help scale up the ventures and other assistance to entrepreneurs.

Being an on-campus Incubator, it gains immensely from the faculty members, research & knowledge base, students, alumni, institutional networks and other resources of IIM Kozhikode. 

IIMK LIVE’s incubation program aims at supporting entrepreneurs in the process of launching their business ventures and turn them into successful business enterprise. IIMK LIVE provide following incubation/entrepreneurship services to incubate companies:

Co-working Environment: IIMK LIVE provides state-of-the-art, co-working facility “LIVE HIVE” to all the incubatee startups at its IIM Kozhikode campus in Kozhikode, Kerala. LIVE HIVE is a smart working environment with fully secure wi-fi network, access to information and knowledge resources such as data cloud, digital/physical library and other essential services. LIVE HIVE would also have meeting rooms, seminar hall and lounge facility. Shared services like Fax machine, Printer, Photocopier, Scanner, Teleconferencing, Projection equipment etc. are also available to the startups.  

Mentoring: Good mentors are critical in a startup journey and are one of the key pillars of IIMK LIVE’s incubation program. Depending upon the type of start up and specific requirement, mentors are assigned for consultation, coaching and connections. These mentors include not only industry experts, serial entrepreneurs and angel investors but also the IIMK faculty members, alumni and successful entrepreneurs.

Training & Workshops: A series of training programs and workshops are organized from time to time by industry experts, academic experts and investors on various topics to help startups in building a sustainable organization.

Professional Services: IIMK LIVE’s partner service providers offer discounted services like cloud service, accounting and auditing, financial services, legal & IP, startup valuation etc. to incubatee startups and conduct periodic awareness sessions at the campus. 

Networking: Startups are connected to various networks of investors, mentors and forums to gain experience and get the knowledge in their area of business. 
 
The larger purpose at IIMK LIVE is to provide all the necessary support that the entrepreneurs require to start and grow a commercial venture that makes economic and social impact.

name: https://kiitincubator.in/
description:
KIIT Technology Business Incubator (KIIT-TBI) was started in 2009 as an initiative of KIIT University and has since been supported by National Science and Technology Entrepreneurship Development Board (NSTEDB), Dept. of Science & Technology (DST), Govt. of India. It is a registered Not for Profit Section (25) Company having registration number U80302OR2009NPL011211, 2009-1010.


Since its inception, KIIT-TBI has provided a vibrant ecosystem for promoting innovations and entrepreneurship development. It has proved to be a potential centre of relevance. and excellence in the eastern part of India. Having established as a premier laboratory incubation centre, KIIT-TBI has expanded its verticals in healthcare, biomedical and social incubation.


Our status as an emerging social innovation hub in the country is reinforced by the DFID INVENT seed fund. KIIT-TBI is a member of Asia Pacific Incubation Network (APIN) and Indian STEPs and Business Incubator’s association (ISBA) and recognized as Scientific and Industrial Research Organization by DSIR.


KIIT TBI over the years


2009-2011

  • Recognised as Business Incubator under DST, Gol
  • Recognised as Technology Incubation and Development of Entrepreneurs (TIDE) centre by, Deity, Gol
  • Recognised Business Incubator under MSME-BI scheme by DC-MSME, Gol
  • Recognised centre for seed fund support by Technology Development Board (TDB) and NIDHI, Gol


2012-2014

  • Established KIIT-TBI Biolncubator under Bio Incubator Support Scheme (BISS) by BIRAC, DBT, Gol
  • Recognised as implementing partner for Biotechnology Ignition Grant (BIG), BIRAC, DBT, Gol
  • Recognised centre for seed fund support by NSTEDB, Gol
  • Establishment of Rural Women Technology Park (STP) at Chikiti with the support of DST, SEED, Gol

 

2015-2017

  • INVENT Incubator award from DFID Innovation and TDB, Gol for promoting social enterprises in the state of Odisha and Jharkhand
  • Implementing partner for NIDHI PRAYAS, EIR & Accelerator Programs
  • Recognised as Startup Odisha Nodal Incubator
  • Recognised centre for seed fund support by BIRAC, DBT, Gol
  • Bio-NEST scheme for scaling up as a world class Bio Incubator by BIRAC, DBT, Gol
  • National Innovation foundation (NIF) has established NIF Bhubaneswar cell to promote grassroot innovations in the eastern region
  • Awarded SILICE as a part of the EU Erasmus+ capacity building program


2018-Present

  • Centre of Excellence in Digital Health and Precision Agriculture supported by NIDHI, DST, Gol
  • Recognised as implementing partner for Social Innovation Immersion Programme (SIIP), BIRAC, DBT, Gol
  • Recognised centre for leap fund support by BIRAC, DBT, Gol
  • Recognised as SPARSH Centre by DBT, Gol
  • Establishment of BIRAC REGIONAL TECHNO-ENTREPRENEURSHIP PROMOTION CENTRE (BRTC) by DBT, Gol
  • Establishment of SFURTI Centre by MOMSME, Gol
  • Establishment of Technology Transfer Office (TTO) under NBM, BIRAC, DBT, Gol
  • Recognised for TIDE 2.0 Centre by MeitY, Gol
  • Implementing partner for Agriculture Grand Challenge (AGC) by Invest India
  • Implementing partner for Boeing India-BUILD Program
  • Implementing partner for ClimateLaunchpad, Climate-KIC, EU

This enables a fleet operator to maintain better control of his tyre inventory and improve operational efficiency by enhancing tyre life and m

The platform is intended to use technology to bridge the gap in providing cost-effective solutions to our customers.

Bizlem is a web 3.0 social business platform that aims redefine e-commerce. Incorporating the state-of-art, semantic web, machine learning and natural language processing technologies. Bizlem.com is working on creating a highly social way of doing business.

They are the team of passionate logistics enthusiast who came together to digitize a large unorganized market of international freight forwarding/shipping. With the help of technology, they intend to make freight life cycle swift, efficient and straightforward.

Myrsa is a platform that connects renters and lenders of temporary spaces. On our platform, Tenants (renters) can easily specify their space request while the Owners (lenders) can offer any of their (empty) spaces for temporary rental. Myrsa helps businesses, service providers, entrepreneurs, retailers, brands, event managers or startups to find the temporary physical space they need to test, sell, serve and grow.

Their mission is to educate aspiring photographers and bring provide them with exposure to opportunities in social and industrial avenues of photography.

name: a-IDEA
description:
Association of Innovation Development of Entrepreneurship in Agriculture (a-IDEA) is a technology business Incubator of ICAR-National Academy of Agricultural Research Management (ICAR-NAARM), it is registered society under Andhra Pradesh Societies Registration Act, 2001, Registration No: 775 of 2014, it was established in July, 2014.It is fully owned by the academy.
    a-IDEA aims to help entrepreneurs ideate,   incubate and accelerate their innovative early stage startups that have potential to scale up  and become competitive food & agri-business ventures through capacity building, mentoring, networking and advisory support.

portfolios.brief:
The name denotes the well-being of the inner self. It’s all about vibrancy and vitality that goes beyond the surface and works from the core. Our inner being makes us what we are outside. Here, we are referring to the inner spark – the unique spirit or aura (as depicted in the reverberating circles in the logo) that makes a person different from the others. Inner Being Health helps you nourish your innate vibrancy and emerge a radiant you!

The ideology of Wellness is based on the core belief of preventive approach to lifestyle. IBW wants to change health behaviors with its nutraceutical ideology. Thus, our brand war cry postulates “Live Nutraceutically! The objective is to develop innovative wellness products and motivate people to live a healthy life without fear. Our confidence towards achieving our motto comes from the fact that we are R&D driven and we dedicate our efforts wholeheartedly towards seeking expertise from the best in the industry. We strive for excellence through quality and consistency, pure natural ingredients, no chemicals or synthetics.

INNER BEING comprises a growing roster of products spanning across the categories of Beauty, Wellness and Nutrition. Inner Being believes in the power of pure plant extracts, ancient wisdom and their synergy with modern research methodology. Headquartered at Hyderabad, Telangana with a pan-India presence, our mission is to make a dent in the industry affecting the lives of people and the society as a whole, positively.
